content.text:
# King Al Akbar

| race =
| awards =
| updated= August 13, 2009
}}
King Al Akbar  () is a New Zealand-bred Hong Kong based racehorse. He won five races in the season of 2010-2011. He was one of the nominees for 2010-2011 Hong Kong Horse of the Year.
References
* The Hong Kong Jockey Club[http://www.hkjc.com/home/english/index.asp#wikipedia]
